argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eldifsn | |- ( X e. ( CC \ { 0 } ) <-> ( X e. CC /\ X =/= 0 ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_cnring | |- CCfld e. Ring |
| 3 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 4 |  | #P_cnfld0 | |- 0 = ( 0g ` CCfld ) |
| 5 |  | #P_cndrng | |- CCfld e. DivRing |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_drngui | |- ( CC \ { 0 } ) = ( Unit ` CCfld ) |
| 7 |  | #P_cnflddiv | |- / = ( /r ` CCfld ) |
| 8 |  | #P_cnfld1 | |- 1 = ( 1r ` CCfld ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invr ` CCfld ) = ( invr ` CCfld ) |
| 10 | 3, 6, 7, 8, 9 | #P_ringinvdv | |- ( ( CCfld e. Ring /\ X e. ( CC \ { 0 } ) ) -> ( ( invr ` CCfld ) ` X ) = ( 1 / X ) ) |
| 11 | 2, 10 | #P_mpan | |- ( X e. ( CC \ { 0 } ) -> ( ( invr ` CCfld ) ` X ) = ( 1 / X ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 11 | #P_sylbir | |- ( ( X e. CC /\ X =/= 0 ) -> ( ( invr ` CCfld ) ` X ) = ( 1 / X ) ) |
